root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 2-2-3, translated into en
root.data:
Data available based on CDHS 2000, 2005, 2010 and 2014.

Data are available by age groups, sex, wealth, mothers' education geographic location (urban/rural) and by sub national and stratified estimates (e.g. sex, age groups, wealth, mothers' education, residence).
